6 ForwardKinematics::ForwardKinematics(const ForwardKinematics& other) : k(other.k){

8  initT = other.initT;
9  T = other.T;
10  prevT = other.prevT;
11  currentPosition = other.currentPosition;
12  radius = 0;

19 void ForwardKinematics::init(){
20  PI = std::acos(-1);
21  initT = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
22  T.push_back(Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity());
23  prevT = initT;
24  currentPosition=std::vector<double>(3,0);
25 }

31 std::pair<double, double> ForwardKinematics::calcICC(double alpha){
32  double x = -k/std::tan(alpha);
33  double y = -k;
34  return std::make_pair(x,y);
35 }
36 double ForwardKinematics::flattenZeros(double value){
37  return (std::fabs(value)<0.000001) ? 0 : value;
38 }
39 double ForwardKinematics::degToRad(double angle){
40  return angle/180.0*PI;
41 }
42 double ForwardKinematics::radToDeg(double angle){
43  return angle/PI*180.0;
44 }

46 double ForwardKinematics::calcRadius(std::pair<double, double> ICC){
47  radius = std::sqrt(ICC.first*ICC.first+ICC.second*ICC.second);
48  return radius;
49 }
50 double ForwardKinematics::calcTheta(double distance, double radius){
51  return distance/radius;
52 }
53 Eigen::Matrix4d* ForwardKinematics::calcRot(double theta, double alpha){
54  Eigen::Matrix4d* rot = new Eigen::Matrix4d();
55  *rot = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
56 
57  if(alpha>0) {
58  (*rot)(0,0)=flattenZeros(std::cos(theta));
59  (*rot)(0,1)=flattenZeros(-std::sin(theta));
60  (*rot)(1,0)=flattenZeros(std::sin(theta));
61  (*rot)(1,1)=flattenZeros(std::cos(theta));
62  }else{
63  (*rot)(0,0)=flattenZeros(std::cos(-theta));
64  (*rot)(0,1)=flattenZeros(-std::sin(-theta));
65  (*rot)(1,0)=flattenZeros(std::sin(-theta));
66  (*rot)(1,1)=flattenZeros(std::cos(-theta));
67  }
68 
69  return rot;
70 
71 }
72 Eigen::Matrix4d* ForwardKinematics::calcTrans(double radius, double distance, double alpha, std::pair<double, double> ICC){
73  Eigen::Matrix4d* trans = new Eigen::Matrix4d();
74  *trans = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
75  double x;
76  double y;
77 
78  if(alpha==0) {
79  x=0;
80  y=distance;
81  }else{
82  double theta = calcTheta(distance, radius);
83 
84  if(alpha>0) {
85  //Anmerkung: vorher stand alpha+theta
86  x = radius*std::cos(theta+alpha)+ICC.first;
87  y = radius*std::sin(theta+alpha)+ICC.second;
88  }else{
89  //Anmerkung: vorher stand PI+alpha-theta
90  x = radius*std::cos(PI-theta+alpha)+ICC.first;
91  y = radius*std::sin(PI-theta+alpha)+ICC.second;
92  }
93  }
94 
95 
96  //(*trans)(0,3)= (std::fabs(x)<0.000001)?0:x;
97  //(*trans)(1,3)= (std::fabs(y)<0.000001)?0:y;
98  (*trans)(0,3)=flattenZeros(x);
99  (*trans)(1,3)=flattenZeros(y);
100 
101  return trans;
102 
103 }
104 std::vector<double>& ForwardKinematics::getUpdate(double alpha, double distance){
105  Eigen::Matrix4d* Ti = new Eigen::Matrix4d();
106  *Ti = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
107  alpha = flattenZeros(alpha);
108 
109  if(alpha==0) {
110  Ti= calcTrans(0, distance, alpha, std::make_pair(0,0));
111  }else{
112  std::pair<double, double> ICC = calcICC(alpha);
113  double radius = calcRadius(ICC);
114  double theta = calcTheta(distance, radius);
115 
116  Ti = calcRot(theta, alpha);
117  Eigen::Matrix4d* trans = calcTrans(radius, distance, alpha, ICC);
118  *Ti = (*trans)*(*Ti);
119  delete trans;
120  }
121 
122  //Eigen::Matrix4d Tn = T.back()*Ti;
123  //T.push_back(Tn);
124 
125  Eigen::Matrix4d Tn = prevT*(*Ti);
126  delete Ti;
127 
128  prevT = Tn;
129 
130  double x = Tn(0,3);
131  double y = Tn(1,3);
132  double e_x1 = Tn(0,0);
133  double e_x2 = Tn(1,0);
134  // Angle in Degrees
135  // double angle = std::atan2(e_x2,e_x1)/(2*PI)*360
136  // Angle in rad
137  double angle = std::atan2(e_x2,e_x1);
138 
139  currentPosition[0]=flattenZeros(x);
140  currentPosition[1]=flattenZeros(y);
141  currentPosition[2]=angle;
142 
143  return currentPosition;
144 }
